rows.label: qst201007_msg0002
rows.name:
'Recently, there have been numerous incidents
in various countries where people have been
attacked and their Core Crystals stolen.'

rows.label: qst201007_msg0003
rows.name:
'This is commonly known as Core
Crystal hunting, and a similar incident
occurred in Gula the other day.'

rows.label: qst201007_msg0004
rows.name:
'The Security Department is currently
investigating, but the culprit has
not yet been identified.'

rows.label: qst201007_msg0005
rows.name:
'If you see any suspicious individuals, please
promptly contact the Security Department
within the Superbian Army's Torigo Base.'
